data.message: Hello... Which is the ability to verify page Vontech (DJ, Producer, Remixer) ... Thanks for the answer.

replies.message: Hi Adnan. Only some public figures, celebrities and brands have blue verified badges. It's not currently possible to request or purchase a blue verified badge. If your account doesn't have a blue verified badge, there are other ways to help let people know that you're authentic. For example, you can link to your Facebook profile or Page from your official website, Instagram profile or Twitter account. You can learn more about Page verification here: http://bit.ly/2lTCpQm. -Elizabeth

All accounts related website, Instagram, Twitter etc.. We believe that the Vontech public figures such as I show its editions around the world, support from celebrities DJs, Producers, etc... Thanks for the quick response.
